rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg001
rows.name:
Hey Yuou.
Are we really having
our strategy meeting here?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg002
rows.name:
Yuou...
You want to have our
strategy meeting here?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg003
rows.name:
Yuou, are you seriously planning
to hold our strategy meeting
in this kind of place?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg004
rows.name:
Hey Yuou.
Ya really want to have our
strategy meeting in a place like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg005
rows.name:
I thought it might be good
to change the mood once in a while[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg006
rows.name:
Now, let's first
review our previous battles.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg007
rows.name:
Having analyzed our battles thus far,
I've come to a conclusion.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg008
rows.name:
With five Drivers on our team
shouldn't we be working together
more effectively?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg009
rows.name: Tora get it.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg010
rows.name:
For instance, Tora is so focused on
Hana that he hasn't really considered
coordinating with Boss and the others.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg011
rows.name:
Exactly. Up until now
we've gotten by with just
Blade-Driver coordination...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg012
rows.name:
So Yuou, you think that
Driver-to-Driver coordination
is also important?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg014
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Wh-What's that...
What is that over at that table!?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg015
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling ]Hm?
What's wrong, Yuou?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg016
rows.name:
Huh? Oh, no...
It's nothing

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg017
rows.name:
As I was saying, we must consider the
importance of the Driver's actions in
co-ordination with-

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg018
rows.name: Wha?!

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg019
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]What that woman over there is eating
[ML:Dash ]that's a new dessert, isn't it!?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg020
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]It looks like some kind of baked sweet[ML:Dash ]
But what's inside it is[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg101
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Fruit?!

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg021
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg022
rows.name:
Is that woman over
there distracting you?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg023
rows.name:
Is our teamwork really
that problematic?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg024
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg025
rows.name:
Are you concerned about
that woman over there?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg026
rows.name: Is our approach really that flawed?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg027
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg028
rows.name:
You appear to be distracted by
that woman over there?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg029
rows.name:
Is there a major issue
with our approach?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg030
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg031
rows.name:
Is that woman over there
catching your attention?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg032
rows.name: Is our teamwork that terrible?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg033
rows.name:
No, that's not it.
Don't concern yourself with it...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg034
rows.name: Yuou has quite the eye for detail.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg102
rows.name:
But Tora also noticed
what caught Yuou's attention.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg035
rows.name:
Tora definitely recognizes
that woman from somewhere...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg036
rows.name:
She must be a spy
who's been following us!!

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg037
rows.name:
No, no, that's not it at all!
She's completely unrelated to this...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg038
rows.name: Meh-meh?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg039
rows.name: So what's the matter?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg040
rows.name: So what's going on?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg041
rows.name: So what exactly is the issue?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg042
rows.name: So what's going on then?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg043
rows.name: ...It's...the dessert

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg044
rows.name:
Dessert?
...What are you talking about?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg045
rows.name:
...The truth is, I'm intrigued by
the dessert that woman is having.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg046
rows.name:
That's all?
You should have just said so!

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg047
rows.name:
Tora wants dessert too!
Can we order some!?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg048
rows.name: Well, I guess it can't be helped...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg049
rows.name:
Well then, let's all enjoy some dessert
while we continue our discussion.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg050
rows.name: It can't be helped...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg051
rows.name:
Let's all have dessert
while we continue our discussion.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg052
rows.name: Honestly, there's no helping it...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg053
rows.name:
Shall we all have dessert
while continuing our discussion then?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg054
rows.name: Oh well, what can ya do...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg055
rows.name:
Alright then, let's have some dessert
while we continue our chat.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg056
rows.name:
In that case, I'd like to order three
of what that woman is having,
if you don't mind?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg057
rows.name: ※deleted※

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg058
rows.name:
Oh...
No, it's not like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg059
rows.name:
There's no issue with
what you're doing...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg061
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Aha!...
Just as I thought, it IS fruit!.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg062
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]And it's been stewed in some kind of
liquid... What could it be!?
Honey? Fruit juice!?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg063
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]What's the matter, Yuou?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg064
rows.name: Huh!?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg065
rows.name:
Oh, sorry about that
Now, where were we...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg066
rows.name:
So here's what I propose
In future battles, I will...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg067
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]It can't be!?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg068
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]What... is this!?
There's something inside
besides just fruit!?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg069
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]It's...it's cream!

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg070
rows.name: What kind of cream could it be?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg071
rows.name:
Damn it, I need to find out...
I need to know
what kind of cream that is!

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg072
rows.name: Um, Yuou?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg073
rows.name: Um, Yuou?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg074
rows.name: Do you have a moment, Yuou?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg075
rows.name: Ah, um, Yuou?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg076
rows.name: Hm!?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg077
rows.name:
Oh, sorry about that
As I was saying...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg078
rows.name: No, that's not the issue.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg079
rows.name:
We could hear everything
you've been muttering to yourself...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg080
rows.name: Y-you what!?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg081
rows.name:
Really, if you want to eat dessert
just say so honestly without
trying to look cool.

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg082
rows.name:
No...
That's not...

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg083
rows.name:
Don't worry.
We all want dessert too, so it's fine!

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg084
rows.name: Is everyone okay with that?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg085
rows.name:
...Fine then.
So what would you like to order, Yuou?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg086
rows.name:
...Oh, whatever.
So what are you craving, Yuou?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg087
rows.name:
...There's no alternative, I suppose
So what would you like to have, Yuou?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg088
rows.name:
I suppose I'm up for that. What d'you
want to order, Yuou?

rows.label: kizunatalk059_msg089
rows.name:
...In that case, let's order
three of the dessert
that woman over there is having.
